name: Issuance of identification card
text: §291-52.5  Issuance of identification card.  The issuing agency shall issue one identification card at the same time it issues a removable windshield placard, temporary removable windshield placard, or special license plates to a person with a disability. [L 2001, c 297, pt of §1; am L 2003, c 30, §5; am L 2010, c 141, §6]
